alice.shortDescription: An original, generic character. Friends with Bob.
alice.description: An original, generic character. Generally, she wants to exchange a message or cryptographic key with Bob.

bob.shortDescription: An original, generic character. Friends with Alice.
bob.description: An original, generic character. Generally, he wants to exchange a message or cryptographic key with Alice.

eve.shortDescription: An eavesdropper, who is usually a passive attacker.
eve.description: An eavesdropper, who is usually a passive attacker. While they can listen in on messages between Alice and Bob, they cannot modify them.
